EmailTemplate.subject: Channel Newsletter October 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
BendixKing ChannelÂ Update | October 2019
AeroNav - NOTICE OF NEW PRICING EFFECTIVE OCTOBER 1, 2019
We have revised the 2019 Price List which goes into effect on October 1, 2019. Specifically, pricing has changed on AeroNav <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/products/aeronav-gps-navigators]]> 800, 900 and 910 models.
The revised Dealer Price List will be available for download from the dealer portal under catalog <[[https://dealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Portal/Home-Page]]>.
<[[https://dealers.bendixking.com/Dealer-Portal/Home-Page]]>
You can find sales bulletins posted here <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/hq0HV0I00Q0000G8Z020Xm0]]> or on www.myaerospace.com <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/kQ0wq0Z009002IG00H0400X]]>.
Contact us <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/WQ0HxZI0q052XG000000900]]> for technical support or visit us at www.bendixking.com <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/CI000l0Uq08Q0ZG0200HX00]]>.
